channel.title: Ip banning from host?
channel.description: ive heard its possible but i cannot find how to do it, i keep getting spammed by him ive allready ip banned over 10+ ips His ips are all from this host: -net.sccoast.net -pool-xdsl-mi.sccoast.net -pool-xdsl-mi.sccoast.net -37-net.sccoast.net -pool-xdsl-mi.sccoast.net -net.sccoast.net any idea how i can ip ban that host?
